com.gej.sound

Class WavSound

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gej.sound.WavSound

  • public class WavSound
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a WavFile from the JAR. You have to load them using the static loadSound() method of the WavPlayer class.
    Author:
    Sri Harsha Chilakapati

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a new WavSound with a specific AudioFormat and sound data
